DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES 1 . To determine prevalence incidence anal HPV infection , include infection high-risk HPV type , among MSM Indonesia , Malaysia , Thailand . 2 . To study prevalence incidence HGAIN among MSM . 3 . To evaluate risk factor , include HIV status , anal high-risk HPV infection HGAIN among MSM . Study population An approximately 75 HIV-positive 75 HIV-negative MSM attend study clinic Kuala Lumpur , Jakarta , Bangkok enrol . The study also enroll 185 HIV-positive 95 HIV-negative MSM previous participant MSM VCT study . There approximately 260 HIV-positive 170 HIV-negative MSM total study .
DOC.brief_title: Study Anal Human Papillomavirus Infection Anal Intraepithelial Neoplasia Among Men Who Have Sex With Men Indonesia , Malaysia , Thailand
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective cohort study newly enroll approximately 150 MSM Kuala Lumpur , Jakarta , Bangkok follow prospectively group 280 MSM previous participant study entitle `` Multidisciplinary service enhance HIV test linkage care among MSM '' ( MSM VCT study ) Jakarta , Bali , Bangkok . Newly enrol MSM three study visit baseline , month 6 , month 12 . MSM previous participant MSM VCT study one study visit .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male history anal sex men previous participant MSM VCT study . 2 . Age 18 year old old . 3 . Indonesian Malaysian Thai citizen identify Indonesian Malaysian Thai National Identification card . 4 . Willing provide location contact information allow contact . 5 . Available followup plan study duration . 6 . Understand study sign inform consent form . 1 . History prior treatment anal cancer OR anal cytology highresolution anoscopy infrared coagulation within 12 month prior enrollment OR trichloroacetic acid podophyllin application intraanal area past month OR evidence active concurrent intraanal perianal bacterial herpes simplex infection . 2 .
